alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Benzie; Grand Traverse; Kalkaska; Leelanau (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:31AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Leelanau, Benzie, Grand Traverse, southwestern Antrim and northwestern Kalkaska Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 230 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Sleeping Bear Point to 18 miles southeast of Jacksonport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sleeping Bear Point around 240 AM EDT. Glen Arbor, Glen Haven and Burdickville around 245 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cedar, Maple City, Leland, Bingham, Lake Leelanau, Suttons Bay, Peshawbestown, Omena, Elk Rapids, Empire, Old Mission, Mapleton and Kewadin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Antrim; Benzie; Grand Traverse; Kalkaska; Leelanau
